projects.name: Trading_Dashboard
projects.challenge: Needed a real-time trading platform that could handle multiple exchange APIs with sub-second latency and reliable state management.
projects.approach: Built a WebSocket-based event pipeline feeding React state via TanStack Query. Designed a modular exchange adapter pattern so adding new exchanges requires minimal code. Implemented encrypted credential storage.
projects.outcome: Production system handling 5+ exchanges with real-time updates. Learned patterns for reliable WebSocket reconnection and state reconciliation.
projects.description: A comprehensive cryptocurrency trading and portfolio management platform with real-time data integration and advanced analytics.
features: Advanced portfolio analytics with PnL tracking
Secure API key management with encryption

projects.name: Canister_Cloud
projects.challenge: Building truly end-to-end encrypted file storage where even the server cannot read user data, with secure sharing between users.
projects.approach: Implemented Identity-Based Encryption via Internet Computer's VetKD system. Designed a multi-canister Rust architecture with chunked uploads and recipient-specific re-encryption for sharing.
projects.outcome: Fully decentralized E2E encrypted storage. Deep understanding of IBE schemes, canister architecture, and cryptographic key management.
projects.description: A decentralized, end-to-end encrypted document storage and sharing platform built entirely on the Internet Computer blockchain.

projects.name: Portfolio_Analytics
projects.challenge: Aggregating position data across multiple exchanges with different APIs, time zones, and data formats into unified analytics.
projects.approach: Built automated data ingestion pipelines that normalize exchange-specific formats. Designed a time-series storage schema optimized for historical queries and aggregation.
projects.outcome: Unified cross-exchange analytics with historical performance tracking. Gained experience with data pipeline reliability and time-series analysis.
projects.description: Advanced cryptocurrency portfolio tracking system with historical performance analysis and customizable metrics.

projects.name: Secure_File_Sharing
projects.challenge: Implementing secure multi-user file sharing where encryption keys are managed without a central trusted authority.
projects.approach: Designed a decentralized key management system using Identity-Based Encryption. Built secure access control with blockchain-based authentication and encrypted metadata.
projects.outcome: Working secure sharing system with no central key server. Deep knowledge of IBE, access control models, and threat modeling.
projects.description: Engineered a secure, end-to-end encrypted file storage and sharing system with decentralized key management.
